channel.title: Itemdef editor for reduction? How do i change prices?
channel.description: i cant edit the prices for stuff on reduction rsps.. i dont think i can change it in shops.java i tried it. does any1 have a itemdef editor i can use for it that works? i tried the matrix editor and it didnt work so i need one for reduction or is there another way to change it?
